turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello assistant. I would like to place a coffee drink order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, I would be happy to help you with that. Where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, what is the location of the Starbucks you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order from the Starbucks on Broadway in Oakland, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, and what do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a Caramel Macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size Caramel Macchiato would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Any specific type of milk for your Grande Caramel Macchiato?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please request Whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, I will be sure to order the Grande Caramel Macchiato with Whole milk. Do you have any other requests for your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you have them use sugar free syrup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I will request sugar free syrup. Is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think that is it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Let me confirm, you would like to order a Grande Caramel Macchiato, made with Whole milk and using sugar free syrup. The location will be Starbucks Cafe on Broadway in Oakland, California. Is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total will be $4.95, do you want me to go ahead and place the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please send the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been sent. Your drink will be ready for pickup at the Starbucks on Broadway in Oakland, California. I have sent the receipt to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, I will look for it. Thank you!
